name: Angel Road
description:
** AngelRoad is a free murder mystery interactive story game you can finish within an hour **

One day... a snowy day... you found yourself on a street called "Angel Road". You vaguely remembered that you were waiting for someone. Yet, nobody showed up forever. You decided to leave the place only to find yourself .... not be able to get out of the street. Can you escape?

The story was originally written by ImCyan. A short and thrilling JRPG style storytelling experience is waiting for you!
